information.resume: In this section you will find all the main information related to BAMBOO. When you connect your wallet, your account information will also be displayed.
information.faq1: With which wallets can I get Bamboo?
information.faq2: What is raindrop and how can I participate?
information.faq3: What is BBYP and how can I participate?
information.faq4: When will the Bamboo Card be available?
information.faq5: When and where will there be ATMs for Bamboo?
information.faq6: What things can be modified in the Governance?
information.faq7: Is the code available to be able to see it somewhere?
information.faq9: Why is the CEO so ugly?
information.faq11: Is there any social or ecological work in which the project participates or helps?
information.faq12: What are the achievements of the roadmap?
information.faq13: What is token burning and what is it for?
information.faq14: How can I be sure of the reliability of the contracts?
information.faq15: What is the code audit and what is it for?
information.faqr1: BambooDeFi is an ETH based platform, you can use Metamask or Walletconnect.
information.faqr2: It is a lottery system that takes place every ten days, you can buy tickets with Bamboo, at a rate of one ticket per Bamboo and participate. There are ten winners who will share out the Bamboo accumulated from the purchase of tickets, one of which is the BambooVault, which will dedicate its part to sustaining the system, and the rest will be determined randomly among the competing tickets.
information.faqr3: Bamboo Burn Yearly Party. An annual lottery system, in which to buy tickets bamboo is burned at the rate of one ticket per Bamboo burned. The prize is 10% of the Bamboo accumulated in the BambooVault throughout the year, and there is a single winner determined at random among all the participating tickets.
information.faqr4: The BambooDeFi team is working hard to offer the card as soon as possible. When it is available it will be communicated through the official channels.
information.faqr5: Bamboo can be implemented in all ATMs sold by AuroraCryptoMachines. We do not yet have an exact date for implementation.
information.faqr6: The community decides everything from developer fees, adding new Pools, rebalancing and even deactivating Pools. The votes are based on the BAMBOO GROWTH RATE. This is a voting system, where you get 1 vote per wallet with Bamboo blocked in the Staking system, under construction yet.
information.faqr7: Currently under development, but will be publicly visible on: GITHUB. The SourceCode of the main SmartContract can also be seen at: EtherScan.
information.faqr8: We are a software development company based in Spain, visit: www.nexxyolabs.com.
information.faqr9: He is like that, you can see his face and the rest of the team at www.nexxyolabs.com.
information.faqr10: They symbolise peace, perseverance and patience; they are strong yet sweet, as well as being a symbol of good luck and the team's favourite animal.
information.faqr11: We collaborate with the Chengdu Giant Panda Research Foundation, donating 5% of the profits obtained with BambooDeFi.
information.faqr12: The roadmap is being followed as planned.
information.faqr13: It is a process of elimination of the token so that it cannot be used or traded, it will be reflected in the network of: <a href="https://etherscan.io/token/0xf56842Af3B56Fd72d17cB103f92d027bBa912e89" target="_blank">EtherScan<a>. Ang pag-aalis ng Bamboo mula sa ecosystem ay isang mekanismo na pumipigil sa pagbawas ng halaga ng presyo ng token.
information.faqr14: All contracts were audited by RED4SEC.
information.faqr15: An audit validates the code by an external company, <a href="https://red4sec.com/" target="_blank">RED4SEC<a> in the case of BambooDeFi, ensuring the solidity, security and eliminating any possible vulnerability of it, meeting all requirements to operate without any danger to users.

walletmenu.resume: In this section you can check the status of your wallet (Total Bamboo, Bamboo in stake and temporality).  Also from this section you will be able to perform QuickSwaps, to create instant liquidity pools without having to search in the list of pairs.

liquidity.resume: In this section you can see the active pools and the history. In the active pools you can see the value in USDT blocked in each pool, its yield per 1000 USDT, the daily, monthly and annual ROI, its available amount, amount in stake and the rewards.

raindrop.resume: In this section you will be able to participate in the raffle that will take place every ten days.
raindrop.buyExplain: Exchange Bamboo for tickets to the next lottery
raindrop.errorCoin: Not enough Bamboo in your wallet

tokens.resume: List of tokens constantly updated, where it will be shown its Symbol, volume, and its percentage of gain or loss.
tokens.name: Name

pairs.name: Pair
pairs.resume: List of pairs permanently updated, where it will be shown its Symbol, liquidity, volume (24h/7days), Fees (24h) , 1year fees/liquidity (based on the volume of 24 hours).

governance.resume: In this section, if you are not connected to your wallet, you will be able to view current and past proposals. Once connected to your wallet, you will be able to launch new proposals and vote on active ones.

vault.resume: In this section the BAMBOOVAULT accounts will be shown in detail (SOLIDARITY WALLET, TEAM WALLET), as well as a list with the token burns made and the programmed ones. In addition, you will be able to see the remaining blocking time of each Bamboo contained in the team wallet.

about.resume: Team formed by the companies NexxyoLabs (www.nexxyolabs.com) (Owners of: AuroraATMs, OuterRing, Experiencia360 and several tools and bots of traditional and crypto trading) and by the company Kindynos as technological partners. (https://kindynos.mx/).
about.subtitle: For the development of BambooDeFi we worked with several partners, including technological, legal, marketing and exchange partners.
about.footer: We work every day to obtain more partnerships for the continuous improvement and optimization of all aspects involved in the development of BambooDeFi.

lending.resume: We will soon open our lending system, the perfect complement to the BambooDeFi community. Join the Home of the Pandas, make your inner panda grow!

pandaspinner.processing: Please confirm your operation and wait...
pandaspinner.closemessage: If you have already confirmed the transaction, closing this window will keep the transaction in progress.
